memberdef.definition: CGAL::Kinetic_surface_reconstruction_3< GeomTraits, PointRange, PointMap, NormalMap, IntersectionKernel >::Kinetic_surface_reconstruction_3
memberdef.name: Kinetic_surface_reconstruction_3

parameterdescription.para: an instance of PointRange with 3D points and corresponding 3D normal vectors.
a sequence of Named Parameters among the ones listed below

listitem.para: a property map associating points to the elements of the point set points
Type: a model of ReadablePropertyMap whose key type is the value type of the iterator of PointRange and whose value type is GeomTraits::Point_3

memberdef.definition: std::size_t CGAL::Kinetic_surface_reconstruction_3< GeomTraits, PointRange, PointMap, NormalMap, IntersectionKernel >::detect_planar_shapes
memberdef.name: detect_planar_shapes

briefdescription.para: detects shapes in the provided point cloud and regularizes them.

parameterdescription.para: a sequence of Named Parameters
an instance of NamedParameters.

listitem.para: a property map associating points to the elements of the point set points
Type: a model of ReadablePropertyMap whose key type is the value type of the iterator of PointRange and whose value type is GeomTraits::Point_3
a property map associating normals to the elements of the point set points
Type: a model of ReadablePropertyMap whose key type is the value type of the iterator of PointRange and whose value type is GeomTraits::Vector_3
Shape detection: the number of neighbors for each point considered during region growing
Default: 12
Shape detection: the maximum distance from a point to a plane
Default: 2% of bounding box diagonal
Shape detection: maximum angle in degrees between the normal of a point and the plane normal
Default: 15 degrees
Shape detection: minimum number of 3D points a region must have
Default: 0.5% of input points
Shape regularization: maximum allowed angle in degrees between plane normals used for parallelism, orthogonality, and axis symmetry
Default: 5 degrees
Shape regularization: maximum allowed orthogonal distance between two parallel planes such that they are considered to be coplanar
Default: 0.5% of bounding box diagonal
Shape regularization: indicates whether parallelism should be regularized or not
Type: boolean
Default: false
Shape regularization: indicates whether orthogonality should be regularized or not
Type: boolean
Default: false
Shape regularization: indicates whether coplanarity should be regularized or not
Type: boolean
Default: true
Shape regularization: indicates whether axis symmetry should be regularized or not
Type: boolean
Default: false
Shape regularization: an axis for symmetry regularization
Default: Z axis that is GeomTraits::Vector_3(0, 0, 1)

memberdef.definition: const std::vector< Plane_3 > & CGAL::Kinetic_surface_reconstruction_3< GeomTraits, PointRange, PointMap, NormalMap, IntersectionKernel >::detected_planar_shapes
memberdef.name: detected_planar_shapes

briefdescription.para: returns the support planes of the detected and regularized shapes.

simplesect.para: vector with a Plane_3 for each detected planar shape.

memberdef.definition: const std::vector< std::vector< std::size_t > > & CGAL::Kinetic_surface_reconstruction_3< GeomTraits, PointRange, PointMap, NormalMap, IntersectionKernel >::detected_planar_shape_indices
memberdef.name: detected_planar_shape_indices

briefdescription.para: returns the indices of detected and regularized shapes.

simplesect.para: indices into points for each detected planar shape.

memberdef.definition: void CGAL::Kinetic_surface_reconstruction_3< GeomTraits, PointRange, PointMap, NormalMap, IntersectionKernel >::detection_and_partition
memberdef.name: detection_and_partition

briefdescription.para: detects and regularizes shapes in the provided point cloud and creates the kinetic space partition.

detaileddescription.para: Combines calls of detect_planar_shapes(), initialize_partition() and partition().

parameterdescription.para: a sequence of Named Parameters
maximum number of allowed intersections for each input polygon before its expansion stops.
an instance of NamedParameters.

listitem.para: a property map associating points to the elements of the point set points
Type: a model of ReadablePropertyMap whose key type is the value type of the iterator of PointRange and whose value type is GeomTraits::Point_3
a property map associating normals to the elements of the point set points
Type: a model of ReadablePropertyMap whose key type is the value type of the iterator of PointRange and whose value type is GeomTraits::Vector_3
Shape detection: the number of neighbors for each point considered during region growing
Default: 12
Shape detection: the maximum distance from a point to a plane
Default: 2% of bounding box diagonal
Shape detection: maximum angle in degrees between the normal of a point and the plane normal
Default: 15 degrees
Shape detection: minimum number of 3D points a region must have
Default: 0.5% of input points
Shape regularization: maximum allowed angle in degrees between plane normals used for parallelism, orthogonality, and axis symmetry
Default: 5 degrees
Shape regularization: maximum allowed orthogonal distance between two parallel planes such that they are considered to be coplanar
Default: 0.5% of bounding box diagonal
Shape regularization: indicates whether parallelism should be regularized or not
Type: boolean
Default: false
Shape regularization: indicates whether orthogonality should be regularized or not
Type: boolean
Default: false
Shape regularization: indicates whether coplanarity should be regularized or not
Type: boolean
Default: true
Shape regularization: indicates whether axis symmetry should be regularized or not
Type: boolean
Default: false
Shape regularization: an axis for symmetry regularization
Default: Z axis that is GeomTraits::Vector_3(0, 0, 1)
Use the oriented bounding box instead of the axis-aligned bounding box.
Type: bool
Default: false
Factor for extension of the bounding box of the input data to be used for the partition.
Type: FT
Default: 1.1

memberdef.definition: void CGAL::Kinetic_surface_reconstruction_3< GeomTraits, PointRange, PointMap, NormalMap, IntersectionKernel >::estimate_detection_parameters
memberdef.name: estimate_detection_parameters

memberdef.name: initialize_partition

parameterdescription.para: a sequence of Named Parameters among the ones listed below

listitem.para: Use the oriented bounding box instead of the axis-aligned bounding box.
Type: bool
Default: false
Factor for extension of the bounding box of the input data to be used for the partition.
Type: FT

memberdef.definition: void CGAL::Kinetic_surface_reconstruction_3< GeomTraits, PointRange, PointMap, NormalMap, IntersectionKernel >::partition
memberdef.name: partition

briefdescription.para: propagates the kinetic polygons in the initialized partition.

parameterdescription.para: maximum number of allowed intersections for each input polygon before its expansion stops.

memberdef.definition: const KSP & CGAL::Kinetic_surface_reconstruction_3< GeomTraits, PointRange, PointMap, NormalMap, IntersectionKernel >::kinetic_partition
memberdef.name: kinetic_partition

briefdescription.para: gives access to the kinetic partition.

memberdef.definition: void CGAL::Kinetic_surface_reconstruction_3< GeomTraits, PointRange, PointMap, NormalMap, IntersectionKernel >::reconstruct_with_ground
memberdef.name: reconstruct_with_ground

briefdescription.para: uses min-cut to solve an inside/outside labeling of the volumes of the kinetic partition and provides the reconstructed surface as a list of indexed polygons.

detaileddescription.para: Estimates a horizontal ground plane within the detected shapes. Cells in the partition below the ground plane receive a weight to be labeled as inside. The z axis is considered as vertical upwards pointing.

parameterdescription.para: an output iterator taking Point_3.
an output iterator taking polygon indices std::vector<std::size_t>.
trades data faithfulness of the reconstruction for low complexity. Must be in the range [0, 1).
output iterator to receive the vertices of the reconstructed surface.
output iterator to store all polygonal faces of the reconstructed surface.

memberdef.definition: void CGAL::Kinetic_surface_reconstruction_3< GeomTraits, PointRange, PointMap, NormalMap, IntersectionKernel >::reconstruct
memberdef.argsstring: (FT lambda, std::map< typename KSP::Face_support, bool > external_nodes, OutputPointIterator pit, OutputPolygonIterator polyit)
memberdef.name: reconstruct

briefdescription.para: uses min-cut to solve an inside/outside labeling of the volumes of the kinetic partition and provides the reconstructed surface as a list of indexed polygons.

detaileddescription.para: The external_nodes parameter allows to indicate the preferred labels for faces on the bounding box.

parameterdescription.para: an output iterator taking Point_3.
an output iterator taking polygon indices std::vector<std::size_t>.
trades data faithfulness of the reconstruction for low complexity. Must be in the range [0, 1).

adds label preference for the faces on the bounding box. Bounding box sides without preset label are chosen by the min-cut. Setting external_nodes[ZMIN] = true sets the inside label as the preferred label for the ZMIN side of the bounding box.
output iterator to receive the vertices of the reconstructed surface.
output iterator to store all polygonal faces of the reconstructed surface.

memberdef.definition: void CGAL::Kinetic_surface_reconstruction_3< GeomTraits, PointRange, PointMap, NormalMap, IntersectionKernel >::setup_energyterms
memberdef.name: setup_energyterms

briefdescription.para: creates the visibility (data-) and regularity energy terms from the input point cloud and the kinetic partition.

memberdef.definition: bool CGAL::Kinetic_surface_reconstruction_3< GeomTraits, PointRange, PointMap, NormalMap, IntersectionKernel >::setup_energyterms
memberdef.argsstring: (const std::vector< std::pair< std::size_t, std::size_t > > &edges, const std::vector< double > &edge_costs, const std::vector< std::vector< double > > &cost_matrix)
memberdef.name: setup_energyterms

briefdescription.para: provides the data and regularity energy terms for reconstruction via min-cut.

parameterdescription.para: contains a vector of pairs of volume indices. Indicates which volumes should be connected in the min-cut formulation.
contains the cost for each edge specified in edges for two labels with different labels. For equal labels, the cost is 0. Needs to be index compatible to the edges parameter.
provides the cost of a label for each volume cell. The first index corresponds to the label and the second index corresponds to the volume index.

simplesect.para: fails if the dimensions of parameters does not match the kinetic partition.

memberdef.definition: void CGAL::Kinetic_surface_reconstruction_3< GeomTraits, PointRange, PointMap, NormalMap, IntersectionKernel >::reconstructed_model_trilist
memberdef.name: reconstructed_model_trilist

briefdescription.para: provides the reconstructed surface as a list of indexed triangles.

parameterdescription.para: an output iterator taking Point_3.
an output iterator taking std::size_t.

memberdef.name: reconstructed_model_polylist_lcc

briefdescription.para: provides the reconstructed surface as a list of indexed polygons.

parameterdescription.para: an output iterator taking Point_3.
an output iterator taking std::vector<std::size_t>.
trades data faithfulness of the reconstruction for low complexity. Must be in the range [0, 1).

memberdef.name: set_outside_volumes

briefdescription.para: Pipeline for piecewise planar surface reconstruction from a point cloud via inside/outside labeling of a kinetic partition using min-cut.

parameterdescription.para: must be a model of KineticShapePartitionTraits_3.
must be a range of 3D points and corresponding 3D normal vectors whose iterator type is RandomAccessIterator.
a model of ReadablePropertyMap whose key type is the value type of the PointRange and value type is GeomTraits::Point_3
a model of ReadablePropertyMap whose key type is the value type of the PointRange and value type is GeomTraits::Vector_3
must be a model of Kernel using exact computations. Defaults to CGAL::Exact_predicates_exact_constructions_kernel. Used for the internal kinetic shape partition.
